A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]'''<ref name="Load/save">{{ytl|ooirHlJorF8|Minecraft Indev - Saving/Loading Files|Bryton Kinney|January 22, 2010}}</ref> was released on '''January 22, 2010''' at 22:51<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "(17:51:45) <Notch> there we go, indev's been updated"</ref>. It was announced on [[The Word of Notch|TWoN]] at 22:57 UTC.<ref>[https://web.archive.org/web/20140427012446/http://notch.tumblr.com/post/347976621/ Indev's been updated with a bunch of goodies] - The Word of Notch, January 22, 2010</ref>

== Additions ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Lava Spawner.png|32px]] [[Lava Spawner]]'''
* When placed, the block would create [[lava]] blocks which would replicate infinitely to fill up specific volumes.
* Added to the inventory.<ref>{{ytl|JssMNidxwk8|Minecraft Multi Color Box|worbat|January 24, 2010}}</ref>

=== Items ===
'''[[File:Bow JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Bow]]'''
* Can now be used to fire arrows.
* Added to the inventory.
** Shooting arrows into lava creates flaming arrows.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''General'''
* Blocks can now be placed on resource items, pushing them out.
* Lava works like water now, but slower.

=== Items ===
'''General'''
* Readded the pulse effect when an item gets picked up in the hotbar.<ref name="Forum4">{{link|url=https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/archive/alpha/alpha-survival-single-player/796522-indev-update|title=Also, has anyone noticed the "warp" effect that the block icons get when you pick up a block of that same type?|author=CG62|website=Minecraft Forum|date=January 22, 2010}}</ref>
* Picking up items with a full inventory after reloading a level sends them to hidden inaccessible slots.{{note|name=FullInv|These slots can only be accessed or viewed with NBT editors.}}
** If the level is not reloaded beforehand, any extra items go to fill up the armor slots. Once they're full no more items can be picked up.
* Stack size reduced to 50 from 99.
** Water and Lava source blocks are now given to the player in stacks of 5.<ref name="Load/save"/><ref name="Forum">{{link|url=https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/archive/alpha/alpha-survival-single-player/796522-indev-update|title=The bad thing is, we no longer have 99 of all items. And Liquid spawners are now limited to 5.|author=Menen|website=Minecraft Forum|date=January 22, 2010}}</ref>

'''[[File:Arrow (item) JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Arrow]]s'''
* Added as an item.
* Now require a [[bow]] to fire.
* Deal no damage to players or mobs yet.
* Added to the inventory.
* Have a shake effect when hitting a block, and slight deviations in where they land.{{verify|type=untestable|edition=java}}
* Now fall down when the block they landed on is removed.

'''[[File:Iron Axe JE2.png|32px]] [[Axe]]s'''
* Half of the axe head has been removed.

=== World generation ===
'''General'''
* Liquid spawner is now in the level generator.
* New lighting pass, preventing stack overflows on huge deep floating maps.
* Caves are less flooded.
* Readded flowers to terrain generation.
* The arrow counter above the hotbar was removed.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Explosion]]s'''
* Now have a higher blast radius.
* Now destroy stone, among other changes.{{more info}}{{verify}}
* Now destroy dropped items.

'''Saving'''
* Players can now save and load the game locally using the [[Java Edition Indev level format|Indev level format]].

'''Other'''
* Players have many times longer combat reach.<ref name="Forum5">{{link|url=https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/archive/alpha/alpha-survival-single-player/796522-indev-update?page=2|title=Also, has anyone else noticed that you can apparently kill ranas telekinetically now?|author=keiya|website=Minecraft Forum|date=January 22, 2010}}</ref>
* Dropped items and TNT no longer bounce when hitting the ground

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''

'''From Indev 0.31 20100114'''
* Picking up items that a player already has a full stack of creates a new stack. One item stacks are no longer created.

== Bugs ==
'''3 bugs reported'''
* Rana now spawns in large numbers, causing lots of lag as they accumulate.<ref name="Forum1">{{link|url=https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/archive/alpha/alpha-survival-single-player/796522-indev-update|title=Glitch Found : Ranas keep spawning and spawning and spawning.|author=Menen|website=Minecraft Forum|date=January 22, 2010}}</ref>
* Flammable blocks no longer ignite in lava.<ref name="Forum2">{{link|url=https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/archive/alpha/alpha-survival-single-player/796522-indev-update|title=Second Glitch: Flammable blocks no longer ignite in lava.|author=Meren|website=Minecraft Forum|date=January 22, 2010}}</ref>
* Armor sprites only show up after saving and reloading a level.{{verify|Could be as late as in-124-2}}
